message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'm willing to give you 400k, now let's negotiate from here.
I'll give you a slightly better offer, Alice. Let's see if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
I'm not willing to meet you in the middle, Bob. I'm offering you 460k, but I'm still holding out for a better deal.
I'm not giving up yet, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm not going to give you the whole pie. Let's see if you'll take it.
